UNPAIR_SITES.TITLE: Unpair Sites
UNPAIR_SITES.UNPAIR_SITES_KEEP_DISKS: Keep disks to use for preseeding if the VMs are reprotected.
UNPAIR_SITES.UNPAIR_MESSAGE_WITH_VPGS: Unpairing this site from site {{site}} will delete all VPGs, protected or recovered between the sites.
UNPAIR_SITES.UNPAIR_MESSAGE_NO_VPGS: You are about to unpair the site with site {{site}}.
